_errors.incorrectChannel: you must be in your voice channel to be able to kick!
_errors.invalidMember: mention a member in the server to kick!
_errors.selfMember: you cannot kick yourself from your own voice channel!
_errors.unknownMember: this user isn't in your voice channel to kick!
_errors.unownedChannel: you don't own this voice channel to be able to kick!

_errors.incorrectChannel: you must be in your voice channel to be able to lock!
_errors.unownedChannel: you don't own this voice channel to be able to lock!

_errors.alreadySetup: you have already setup your server!
_errors.commandIneffective: Unable to setup. Try again or contact the developer if this persists.
_errors.reactionUnresponsive: you didn't respond with a reaction.

embedMessage.title: %s Setup Configuration
embedMessage.description:
Thanks for adding me to your server! Before you start, I need to setup a few things. I can do two configurations:

**üîÆ Automatic Setup** *(Recommended)*
This will create a new channel category with the relevant channels so that your members can generate voice channels with ease. This will also have a text channel so that your members can manage their channels.

**‚öôÔ∏è Manual Setup**
If you already have a category setup with a text and voice channel, I can use them with this setup. I will ask for category and channel IDs so that I know which category you want me to control.

embedMessage.title: Automatic Setup Complete!
embedMessage.description:
The automatic setup is now complete and everyone can use the channels to create and manage their own voice channels.

In case you lose any vital channels, you can type `%ssetuprepair` to repair the channels in question or to change channels.

embedMessage.title: Manual Setup Unavailable
embedMessage.description:
Sorry, %s, my developer hasn't coded me to complete this task. Please use my automatic setup instead.

Type `%ssetup` to setup again.

embedMessage.title: %s Setup Configuration
embedMessage.description:
